request_id.description: RequestID is a UUID of a request so we can correlate requests with response on one stream.

resource_name.description: Name of the resource on which we execute config dump.

resource_mesh.description: Mesh of the resource on which we execute config dump. Should be empty for ZoneIngress, ZoneEgress.

XDSConfigRequest.title: XDS Config Request
XDSConfigRequest.description: XDSConfigRequest is a request for XDS Config Dump that is executed on Zone CP.
